task.name: g.manual
task.description: Displays the manual pages of GRASS modules.

flag.name: m
flag.description: Display as MAN text page instead of HTML page in browser

flag.name: o
flag.label: Display online manuals instead of locally installed
flag.description: Use online manuals available at http://grass.osgeo.org website. This flag has no effect when displaying MAN text pages.
